h1: How Many Calories in a Piece of Little Caesars Pizza?

quick_answer.text: A slice of Little Caesars pepperoni pizza has about 280 kcal and 12 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one slice of Little Caesars pizza?
faqs.a: Approximately 280 kcal for a pepperoni slice from a large pizza.

faqs.q: What are the macros in a piece of Little Caesars pizza?
faqs.a: About 34 g carbs, 12 g protein, 12 g fat per slice.

faqs.q: Does Little Caesars pizza have high sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 560 mg per slice due to cheese, sauce, and toppings.

faqs.q: How do calories change with different toppings?
faqs.a: Meats add 20-50 kcal; veggies add fewer, about 10-20 kcal per slice.

faqs.q: Is Little Caesars pizza lower calorie on thin crust?
faqs.a: Yes, thin crust reduces calories by about 40 kcal per slice versus classic.
